text: Jerusalemi kumakura Ra Anumzamo'a huno, Mofavre onte naravo a'moka ranke hunka musena huo. Kagra mofavrema nezamante'za zamatagu nehaza zana ontahi'nananki, ranke hunka zagamera nehunka musena huo. Na'ankure vere'ma mani'nesia a'mo'ma antesnia mofavre nagara, kagri mofavre naga'moza ohampriga'a fore hu'za zamagateregahaze.
